page.title: 18RESIDENTIAL DEVELOPMENT
page.content: The western side of Wellingborough has seen great changes since the 1960's. An arrangement with the G.L.C. to house London overspill resulted in what was agricultural land being used for building. Later, builders embarked on new private housing estates to house the influx of people not only from London, but also other parts of the country. The setting up of the Enterprise Zone is the latest part of the expansion of Wellingborough in this area. Housing is a mixture of Council, private and housing association ownership. Prices of houses range from Â£15000 for a one bedroom flat to Â£60000 for a 4 bedroom detached house. Joint ownership schemes are available on some properties to help people with the purchase of property.
